posts.title: The Package Arrived
posts.content:
Topic: The Joys (and Horrors) of Online Shopping
Title: The Package Arrived! (Now What Is It?)

My wallet's enemy. The thrill, the mystery, and the occasional regret of clicking 'buy now' from your couch.
